testcase.title: RHSM-TC : rhsm.cli.tests.ReposTests.testYumConfigManagerTransactionsWillNowGenerateRedhatRepo
testcase.description: verify that the subscription-manager yum plugin will be invoked by yum-config-manager thereby populating the redhat.repo file (eliminating the need to run a seemingly no-op yum repolist just to populate an empty/missing redhat.repo file.) Reference RFE Bugzilla 1329349
